website_summaries.verdict: A slim design and a modern carbon fiber-like print on this leather wallet make it a good choice for daily use.
pros: Outside pocket holds most used credit card, with a finger slide to ease removing it
cons: Wallet is small, and though it's sized to fit U.S. bills, it is a tight fit
If the wallet is overloaded, it can be bulky

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet. I like the look and fits more ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet. I like the look and fits more than expected. I purchased it for travel but has turned into an everyday wallet. It is well constructed and fits well in front or rear pocket. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coley

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and thin wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this wallet, I only have two minor issues. I'm not a big fan of the clear plastic used to cover the ID slot and would much rather have a mesh, but this is just my opinion. My other issue is that I've been using this wallet every day now for a few weeks and the card slots in the wallet are not loosening at all and are still pretty tight, which leads to the minor fight to get my cards out at the register. Honestly not a big deal, overall it's a great wallet and I'm going to keep using it, but that's why I knocked off one star.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Huett

customer_reviews.title: Way easy way better than the price would suggest!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how great this cheap wallet is. Inexpensive is a better description than cheap. I researched a lot of fourth dollar wallets and got confused. I ordered this instead thinking I could use it to keep overflow cards of I still wanted something better. This wallet is perfect. I love the outside slot for my main credit card and the finger slot for my license. It can hold plenty of cards and cash depending on how fat you want to let it get. I have five cards and my drivers license, and around then bills and there's room for more. Once you stuff more than that in there it tends to lose its low profile.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for -- a thin wallet that stays thin
customer_reviews.text: I've had a fat wallet forever, a combination of too many cards and a thick leather wallet. Looking for a thinner wallet, I chose this one, and I'm happy I did. There are enough slots inside for vital cards and pockets for the rest of whatever you need (both can probably hold 4-5 each, but will thicken wallet a lot). The outside slot provides easy access to the card(s) you need most. Overall, this wallet gives me exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: M. Alper

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, stays flat
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. I like this wallet for the RFID protection and easy access card or license on the outside, plus the inner-left license holder. It's a good-looking wallet that has sort of a 3D carbon fiber appearance without being over-the-top. I don't know why, but compared to my last wallet, this one tends to lie flat versus popping open when sitting on my desk. In my pocket, it's definitely a lower profile look. Five months into using it, it looks brand new with the stitching holding perfectly. The price on Amazon was right so I'd definitely recommend. I didn't receive a discount or product for writing the review. I just wanted to share a good find.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino Beach Media

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very slim wallet!!! My husband was searching for a slim wallet because we were tired of the typical bulky wallet. It fits absolutely perfect in the back pocket not making it so bulky and uncomfortable when you sit. My husband did put a rubber band the first day so the wallet would stay close. After he took it off it stayed closed and slim. This wallet is absolutely perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Like it other than lack of long term durability.
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the second one I've purchased, so I guess I like them pretty well. My first one ripped at the inner cloth lining and started to annoy me but otherwise I like the wallet. They are lower cost and you get what you pay for. I'll probably buy a third one when this one starts falling apart, which will take a year or two. Fwiw, ive had a coach wallet and it ripped and started talking apart in about the same amount of time.....
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Compact but holds  a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Holds cards securely and is compact but holds what you need..so far is holding up well..for the cost I think it was a good buy,I would buy it again.gave it as a gift ..comes in a great gift box..will be buying more..I bought the black fiber leather model..love the look!!
customer_reviews.author: marieatwell

customer_reviews.title: Solid Slim Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty nice, and the front card slot is interesting. The material is a little more stiff than I expected (versus a softer more flexible leather) but seems like good quality. Not ultra slim/minimalist, but slim enough that I can fit it in my front pocket and carry everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Easily overcame the little things
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wallet for a little while now and I’m happy with it. The small compact design makes it easy for me to carry in my front pocket. At first I thought it was plastic because the outside texture made it feel fake but it’s leather. I have more than two cards inside so the top bulges a little bit I expect that the way the cards sit inside. The outside notch makes it easy to pull out whatever card I put in it which is my debit card. Only problem with the notch is that either my last four digits show or the chip.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Well put together
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have only had this a couple of weeks, I can tell that it is well made. I have purchased similar products in the past only to have them get flimsy and allow credit cards to fall right out everytime I opened them up. They have definitely put some thought into the design. I like the way it looks and it fits nicely into my front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S. Barnicott

customer_reviews.title: Slim and nice! Can hold many cards.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a wallet I had been using for many years. Since I’ve received it, I’ve been using it and it’s been great. It is nice and sleek in my opinion and certainly slim for a nice look. A tip however for breaking this wallet in is in order: • If you have a bit of cards like me, it will seem as though you won’t be able fit all your cards in without the wallet becoming bulky and not remaining closed. After putting all my cards in and placing the wallet under books or crammed in my pocket, eventually it did “loosen up” and sits perfectly closed without force. Other than that, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, perfect for a few cards and cash
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different wallets, always looking for something thin but also capable of holding a few cards and cash. Other reviewers mentioned this wallet is "the one" and it really is all around an excellent wallet. The materials are high quality, it is very thin but still capable of holding my 6 or so cards and license, plus a nicely fitted cash holder slot. The external card slot is perfect for the most-used debit/credit card. Very happy with the purchase and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Luchs

customer_reviews.title: Decent wallet
customer_reviews.text: Not bad wallet. Room for some cash, outside pocket for most used card and holds decent amount of cash. Very small wallet, soft, light. Haven't tested rf protection but card that came with the wallet says it doesn't block security badges
customer_reviews.author: sbojr

customer_reviews.title: I finally found my perfect wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my standard black wallet for years and I finally wanted to get a new one. It took me a long time to find the best wallet and I'm glad that this is the one! The carbon fiber is really cool and it's different because I don't see carbon fiber wallets too often. I also have no problems fitting in seven cards in it as well. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Prasoon Singh

customer_reviews.title: Low profile—high tech look
customer_reviews.text: The wallet has a smaller profile than standard bodied designs and a high tech look. I bought it for my husband who likes both features. He said he needed more credit/ID card slots but the low profile was a good trade off. Cannot really comment yet on durability but the craftsmanship looks sturdy. The RFID protection is also a plus. Good value for the price in a lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: LBZ

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!  Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Love the cards on the outside. Smallish, and that's what I want. Space for about 10 cards in total, cash and a few receipts. Great value at this price. Will buy again and again if and when this wears out. Just what I wanted! Very similar to the $90 Tumi I liked, and nowhere near the cost. Looks classy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!! Not real leather....
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 wallets and got really dissapointed. First of all it is not real Leather... this description is incorrect... maybe is PU Leather but it is not real leather. Second: I've tried both of them trying to see if the RFID blocker works... and guess what? It doesn't. I just lose money.... really, really bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Gift
customer_reviews.text: The wallet was wrapped nicely in a box, however the overwhelming chemical smell is upsetting. I knew this wasn't leather but what the hell is it actually made out of? The texture and feel of it is cheap and plastic-y. I don't see this holding up at all... Too late to send back so I hope my husband can find some use for it.
customer_reviews.author: TeeB

customer_reviews.title: Slick, stylish and functional plus value! 🤗
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was just right for me. Initially bought the Levi wallet gave to my brother because it was too thick and he has more cards than me. This has slots for 2 or 3 cards another for ID AND is RF deterrent. The new to me micro fiber leather is classy, unique and supposedly real durable.
customer_reviews.author: Merle R Mollenkopf Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Falling to Pieces
customer_reviews.text: So, this wallet started out great. Very slim, very comfortable, and very convenient. I haven’t had it 20 days and parts of it are coming apart. Not too happy about this. I won’t be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: William James Schexnayder

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this wallet! This is definitely a wallet that will due to the material. I love the quality and the durability. I will say that it’s doesn’t fit as many cards as I would like, but reducing the amount of cards also reduces the size of the wallet. I keep the essentials in there now. I really like the card slot on the outside of the wallet, too. It’s quick and easy access to my most used card.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: decent wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement front pocket wallet. Been using for 5 months now. Just starting to see deterioration at the fold. Stitching has held up nicely. No wallet stank when i have gotten sweaty. The deterioration is why I marked as 4 star not 5.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeLife

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet itself is very well well built. The outside feels like carbon mesh and the inside of leather (I suppose that is just because of the model). All of the pockets/slots are tight enough to hold firm the cards and whatnot, but not so tight they can't be removed. Overall, very happy with this wallet purchase. Will consider this company again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: wile_coyote7

customer_reviews.title: This wallet slowly falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet in January of 2019. For the first few months it worked great, but then it started coming apart. It started at the fold. The outside edges started peeling off. There would be dangling pieces of it hanging off the edges. Eventually, the entire outside edge of the wallet began to come off. I have had it for less than two years and I've already had to buy another wallet to replace it. On the whole, it looks nice and works well to start, but it does not have the durability to last for any significant length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, fits well in tighter Jean's too
customer_reviews.text: Great durable tiny wallet. Make sure you have less than 5 plastic cards. Anymore and it's too bulky but thats the whole reason of downgrading a smaller wallet. Not for too much cash either. Perfect inside my pockets , should have gotten this along time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more on something else. You'll thank yourself.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very stiff, low quality leather. It is also very small. Bills stick out the top making it obvious how much cash you have, and it doesn't hold very many bills, or cards. To be fair it only costs $11 but it seems fairly unusable. May be suitable for a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Nameless review

customer_reviews.title: We'll made but on the small side for most people
customer_reviews.text: We'll made but only has slots for 6 cards total cramming more than one card in a slot is possible if impractical. The wallet is not very tall so US dollars almost hang out and are clearly visible even when the wallet is closed
customer_reviews.author: zoomzoom870

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very great product. This wallet is very durable and slim. My bf always complain about his wallet being so thick and very uncomfortable when put it in pockets. So every time we go out, he either carry it on hand or put in my bag. I decided to brought this for him as a gift and he really like it because of how thin and light it is. Will recommend to everyone one
customer_reviews.author: KDan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is really picky! I got this for his birthday, for him and he loves it! He's been showing it off, says it's just what he needed! It did turn out to be thin enough for it not to hurt when he puts it in his back pocket and sits, and he really likes the way it looks! You can hold multiple cards in each slot. I think he's got at least 20 cards in it now with room for more. Perfect fit and product! Although, I am a little disappointed it's not real carbon fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet. I've had it for a couple months and it looks the same as the day I bought it. Outside pocket is very convenient for storing credit cards, subway passes, etc. I like the carbon-fiber finish as well. Have received several compliments on this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: fosterp321

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy,Safe Feeling using.
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of the Carbon Fiber,very smooth,silky like but the best part is the external pocket for a credit card.it hold it tight so it Can't fall out,its so secure that they put a small access hole at inside of pocket so you can push the card out.All-In-All a very decent wallet you'll love.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect transition from a large bulky wallet to something sleek, yet practical that fits nicely in my front pocket. Been pick-pocketed too many times to keep it in my back pockets anymore, plus not having the bulge sticking into my butt when sitting is a life changer.
customer_reviews.author: Seanzy

customer_reviews.title: Very Light and Sturdy! Travels Well!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is surprisingly well-made! I bought this wallet to replace my money clip that decided to stop holding my money. ;) This wallet is perfect for those that want a secure wallet that is light and compact and travels well. However, if you want a designer looking wallet or a wallet that can carry many cards or pictures, this may not be a good choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, protective, stylish wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel and fit of this wallet. Its outside dimensions are just perfect, meaning it is just large enough to hold your cards and cash, but not overly bulky. I only wish it had one more card slot. I’m still very pleased with my purchase and the price was very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is well made and exactly as advertised. It was probably my fault because I was looking for a front pocket wallet and this is a bit thick for that. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a Rfid blocking wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Rmclan

customer_reviews.title: Set slim; holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good wallet. It has held up well so far in my front pocket every day fit several months now. My only complete is that it hasn’t really “broken in.” Getting cards in and out of the slots is still very difficult as the slots are very tight. Overall though, it’s a good minimalist wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Baker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. I had a slimmer wallet before and needed a little more room so found this. It’s not near as bulky as normal wallets but has enough room for all my cards and any cash I carry and slim enough to fit in my front pocket without noticing it being there.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Slim, durable
customer_reviews.text: I've used this wallet for over a year and have been really pleased with it. It still looks like new, seems to block RFID scanning of the chips on my credit and debit card that are kept in the inner pockets while the outer pocket allows me to keep my keycard in it without interfering with its operation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I typically just buy cheap wallets and wasn't expecting much from this guy, but this is surprisingly durable and good-looking. Don't tell Amazon, but they accidentally sent me two and I now have my wallet covered for at least the next couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to live like George Costanza anymore
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the size. More compact means I have to carry less cash and cards than my previous " George Costanza" wallet which means less bulk. I like limiting myself to just a few cards. I also like the cardholder on the front for my most used card. The color selection is nice also. I've purchased 2 so far ( blue and black ) and getting ready to buy Brown. Shipping was very fast, arrived a few days early and great price.
customer_reviews.author: john james sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Actually Probably the best wallet I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but I have super happy and satisfied with this wallet. I wasn't sure about getting a slim type wallet. I wanted to change out my 5 year old bifold wallet and have been looking for about 3 months for a new wallet. The price point and positive reviews made me give this a try. I have been impressed. Fits everything I need except pictures. Wasn't able to keep the kids pics in here but that's fine. My only con is I wish it was better quality of leather, but its surely just a personal preference. I will keep this wallet for awhile unless i happen to find one similar with better leather quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Cayetano

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and cool design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Wallet as a gift for my son he absolutely loves it my brother saw it and he want me to buy one for him as well. Seems well made time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for front pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after he had been toting around a more traditional wallet. He loves it because it fits in his front pants pocket. He travels pretty light wright with just 5 or 6 cards and bills. He is very pleased. And it’s good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby
customer_reviews.text: Looks slick and modern, appears to be very durable (will update review if that changes), very handy outer sleeve for the oft-used debit card, and doesn't stretch out tight pockets! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: 6sensesfeeling5

customer_reviews.title: Compact with compartmrnts plastic
customer_reviews.text: Like this wallet, its the right size and enough compartments for what i need. Material feels like a carbon fiber plastic. Tried to scan my work ID on a scanner and didnt let me. Had to take ID out of wallet So I guess the wallet does work. Hope it works on intruders. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquito

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide RFID protection
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the wallet but it did not provide RFID protection. My entire office has RFID scanners and it read my card on every single one. Love the look and feel though.
customer_reviews.author: Seadinks

customer_reviews.title: Very small and tight.
customer_reviews.text: The size is very very small. It cannot accommodate any kind of money unless it is twisted which makes it barely suitable for few money papers. Also no enough space for cards. I am very unsatisfied with this product. I would not recommend it for those who like to hold quite good amount of money in their pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Aqeel Alawadh

customer_reviews.title: Looking to go smaller? Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical buying this wallet bought I am enjoying it. It's smaller than previous wallets I've used and it's made me reduce the amount of unnecessary things I carry around. I purchased it in black and I really like the carbon fiber finish.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s a very slim wallet so no more thick, annoying & noticeable wallet. Professional looking. Awesome wallet over all.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: TUMI QUALITY FOR 1/10 THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Really great - and not just “for the price”. I’d have paid Tumi prices if I would have known the quality was going to be as good as it is. The card slot on the outside is really helpful, and all every card can be pulled from its slot without any struggle - including the ID slot. I’ve found it to be a struggle to quickly slide my license out of the ID window with the low-cost Wallets I’ve purchased previously, so thought that was worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely well made
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what I wanted. I have problems and a single fold like this with driver's license and credit cards and insurance cards just make it so thick. And to put it in either rear pocket really hurts my back. That's not the products fault. The quality is good and I normally don't carry it in a pocket but then tend to forget to take it places alot.
customer_reviews.author: josh swanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wallet for me, just enough pockets for my cards and a regular pocket for my dollar bills. Hated the clip type, tried it, didn't like it. So this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John Kenpo

customer_reviews.title: KB
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for 2 weeks. It's contouring in shape to items being carried. I like the quick access holder on the outside where I keep the credit card I use the most. At this point I would buy anther one.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice wallet. Slim, fits in the pocket well. It's slight wider than expected, but since it's slim, it works fine. Good price, recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Probably for a teenager.
customer_reviews.text: Ok the only problem I have with this purchase was the wallet was small, I wouldn't recommend this to man, probably a pre teen young man
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wallet! Especially if you don't use cash.
customer_reviews.text: High quality material and looks great! As with most wallets it is a little stiff at first but after a few weeks it's good. I love the credit card sleeve in the front. I never use cash so it's quick and easy to swipe your card and go.
customer_reviews.author: Erek Campanelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking compact wallet Small but holds alot only reason im giving it four stars is because its not rfid scanner proof as advertised and thats one feature i really wanted
customer_reviews.author: lulu centola

customer_reviews.title: Great slim design
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. His other billfold was thick and always hurt his back if he had in his back pocket and we drove for a length of time. He said this design holds everything that he had in his other one...but doesn't hurt his back when driving. He highly recommended to anyone else that has this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Need a new wallet? This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Been testing the wallet for about a week now and it's very lightweight and so far durable for daily usage! It's a bit snug for all my cards but it was time to downsize the cards in wallet anyway. The carbon fiber black is a really nice look and feel. My money (US dollars) doesn't poke out the top where cash is held. Great replacement for my old wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Visible credit card is a convenient feature
customer_reviews.text: We can see our credit card without opening the wallet. My husband recently misplaced his gas credit card so I bought him this wallet for his 78th birthday. Now he can make sure by visual confirmation that his card is correctly replaced in his billfold. He also appreciates the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Cory

customer_reviews.title: Card Holder Way Too Loose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my prior wallet was getting so old that it wasn't holding my credit cards like it used to. However, straight our of the box this one has the same issue even though it's brand new. My cards easily fall out of the front card pocket so this was a waste of $13 and I'll have to find a new one that can hold them better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paine MD

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am still enjoying the first wallet I bought and bought a second one as I tend to be hard on wallets and when this one needs to be replaced I want exactly the same wallet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wallet
customer_reviews.text: I just like how small and compact it is, I'm a guy that needs a wallet but don't like the big bulky ones, so now I can drive with it in my back pocket without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet, lasted over a year now still looks new.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this wallet daily for over a year now. Zero issues. Carbon fiber look still looks new. Love the front card holder for easy, quick access to cards. Personally have 2 of my most used cards in that slot. Over time realize that cards do tend to get a bit loose but nothing has just fallen out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t miss this deal on this sweet a** steal!
customer_reviews.text: I always hate leaving the house for necessities. Online shopping makes it so much easier. Great produce for the price. Item shipped early. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, light and for only those that want to carry little cash and credit cards. Have not tested how well it is RFID protected. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teton

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: Ive been eyeballin this wallet and finally got it. However I was just a tad dissapointed because its alittle bit smaller then what i would normally have throughout the years. But all in all its just different, just something that ill need to get used to.also keep in mind this is a slim fit wallet so that it fits in your front pocket! Some of us forget that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and slim
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of this item. It fits the bill when you do not want to carry a bulky wallet. Smart and well made
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold as much as my old wallet, but that helped me clear my wallet of junk. The wallet is very comfortable to carry, easy to access and use, and even visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: James Vivelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my significant other. He really likes it. I am a big fan of sleek designs and this wallet looks really nice. Has great quality and design. I think this is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ja'Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It's very small
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is very pretty however it is smaller than it looks if you have a lot of cards this is not a good buy 😔
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer garcia

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old loves this wallet. Nice design, sleek and not as large as a regular wallet. I'm thinking about getting one flr myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good wallet for the price, this wallet is fairly good and can be used daily, it can hold at least 4 cards and cash, the cards are sturdy and nothing has fallen out, I’ve had for it for about a month and it still looks good
customer_reviews.author: lucas walker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet I like it alot, after a month the top is freying a little but overall i really love this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Marschall

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Slim, sleek and durable. Came in good condition! Bought this wallet for my boyfriend, he loves it. It actually looks better than I expected. Definitely worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tang Yuk

customer_reviews.text: it's everything it says in the description.... I don't know if it blocks RFID but it does the job can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: “A Little Wallet”
customer_reviews.text: If you like smaller wallets this is the wallet 4 u. Unfortunately it was just to small and I had to send it back. It wasn’t a bad wallet, it was just to small.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lenarz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Got this wallet as a gift for my brother, and it has lasted him for a couple of years now. And it looks to have a few more good years of use still. Thin, durable, and stylish. Would recommend and buy for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good wallet for the price and has a slim profile. I just question the "RFID blocking" claim as I keep my RFID key card for work in it and use it to get into the building without ever taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Julian

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and lasts quite a long time. Doesnt hold to much but I will prolly buy again. Had this one 3 years and still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Shaun from Enfield, Conn

customer_reviews.title: Good until it unstitched
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wallet but started unstitching within 4-5 months :( idk how the 1 year guarantee works or else I’d put 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Santana

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cool wallet, seems durable. RFID blocking works but it doesn't block ID badges, so I can keep my badge in the outer pocket and get into work without having to take it out of my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: V.N.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wear well
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 months the edges are already coming off. This item does not wear well; it wears out easily
customer_reviews.author: AledoDMC

customer_reviews.title: Not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice medium size wallet. Not too big and not too small. It's perfect to be in my front pocket. I've been putting my wallet in front instead of the back pocket for 2 reasons. 1. security 2. saves pants
customer_reviews.author: RollMan

customer_reviews.title: Solid wallet for use
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage and expandability while after extended use it becomes less uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DocLewis

customer_reviews.title: Compact but that extra pocket make the diference.
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me a new wallet for Father’s Day like the boxing that came and the wallet in that cover make it feel already like a spensive wallet the feeling of it is like real leather and the carbon fiber look make it so cool I like it best give.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole bukata

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the wallet for 11 months and still looks amazing!! I have more stuff in it then they recommend and It’s still holding up. I’d definitely buy another one when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Zazoooooo

customer_reviews.title: Item never came just realized..
customer_reviews.text: This item I purchased long ago and I don't remember it ever came.
customer_reviews.author: Rahil Vora

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is like plastic almost, not very flexible and doesn’t look much like leather.
customer_reviews.author: Tigan

customer_reviews.title: Slim wallet strong construction
customer_reviews.text: Slim nice looking strong wallet. Sometimes it's a little difficult to put money in. But I like the card slot on the outside to hold my most used cards and IDs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice pocket wallet, fits only essentials.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's small and slim though, so don't expect to fit anything more than a couple of plastic cards, your ID and a few bills. Good fit for slacks or nicer clothing where you don't want a bulky wallet pushing at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Some Cat & Dog PersonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice wallet for my 16 year old sons first wallet. Reasonably priced. Arrived on time for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Trina W.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend because I was tired of seeing his busted up old one he has bad for years. He opened it and loved it! It’s very expensive looking and isn’t bulky with all his belongings in it. Very good product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: keanna berger

customer_reviews.title: Wallet came in great packaging and functions as expected
customer_reviews.text: Wallet came in great packaging and functions as expected. I have my drivers license and about 8 credit and insurance cards in the wallet. I keep my main debit and credit card in the easy access outer cardholder. In my case the money fits in the wallet well and does not stick up above the wallet's lip as some have said. Good product at a great price. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ReadyAct

customer_reviews.title: Durable and small. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wallet for months. Durability is great. It's much better then the old school dad wallet. And I love the front spot for quick access to the most used cards.
customer_reviews.author: Fuj

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband and he LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet. He likes the carbon fiber material, he likes that it’s RFID protected and states that it’s a little slimmer than his others.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Had my wallet for about 2 years and it's still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to the traditionally large sized wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great option for slimming down the traditionally fat wallet. Advertised as front pocket wallet however, works great with the slim design in the back pocket and has not caused any noticeable discomfort being in the back pocket. Love the accessible front slot for card. As other have stated, not a wallet designed for large quantities of bills or numerous cards but truly great for slimming down. Love the carbon fiber design too!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Work that it
customer_reviews.text: Had the wallet for a couple of months now , we’ll worth it . Very sturdy the cards don’t fall out
customer_reviews.author: RIVERA FAMILY

product_meta.title: Casmonal Mens Leather Wallet Slim Front Pocket Wallet Billfold RFID Blocking (Weaved Black)
feature_bullets: A SLIM WALLET: 4 1/8” X 3 1/8” X 1/2”, significantly smaller than most other billfolds in the market, numerous samples and tests have been made before the final size is decided: it is so slim that the cash slot can hold US bank notes only.

A FUNCTIONAL WALLET: an easy access card slot on the surface to place your most frequently used card; inside there is one ID slot, two card slots and one big cash slots—just enough space for your casual daily use.

A SAFE WALLET: this billfold is equipped with RFID blocking feature and can block all RFID signals from your ID card, credit/debit card, driver license. Notes: some ID badges and access cards that work at a lower frequency can not be blocked.
A HAPPY PURCHASE GUARANEED: if you are not happy in any manner, hassle free return or exchange is provided by our customer service team.
